column4: Question: If I install linux-image-3.1.4-generic_3.1.4_amd64.deb - will it automatically update installed kernel modules too? Im upgrading my kernel so that one of the modules is rebuilt as well
Or actually - given the structure of modules.. I guess it doesnt need to be rebuilt just updated
a package manager should manage that for you, yeah
just grab that .deb as well from where ever you got the other...
